A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think the story was written with the insight of a 3rd grader.  The ideas that made Star Wars special were shredded in the Disney machine that is more interested in selling toys and video games then telling a good story.  It was a terrible waste of the classic characters that were hardly a shadow of their former selves.  The 2 stars are for a fight scene and a few laughs from Chewy.
